product.name: Brake Pad Set - Premium
product.description: High-performance ceramic brake pads for superior stopping power and reduced brake dust. Compatible with most sedan models.

product.name: Oil Filter - Standard
product.description: Standard replacement oil filter that removes contaminants from engine oil. Fits most passenger vehicles.

product.name: Spark Plug Set - Iridium
product.description: Long-lasting iridium spark plugs for improved fuel efficiency and engine performance. Set of 4.

product.name: Brake Rotor - Front
product.description: Precision-engineered front brake rotor with anti-rust coating for extended life and optimal braking performance.

product.name: Air Filter - Performance
product.description: High-flow air filter that improves engine breathing and horsepower. Washable and reusable.

product.name: Brake Fluid - DOT 4
product.description: High-temperature brake fluid with superior moisture resistance. Meets DOT 4 specifications.

product.name: Timing Belt Kit
product.description: Complete timing belt kit including tensioners and water pump. Essential for scheduled maintenance.

product.name: Shock Absorber - Rear
product.description: Gas-charged rear shock absorber for improved handling and ride comfort. Sold individually.

product.name: Brake Caliper - Remanufactured
product.description: Professionally remanufactured brake caliper with new seals and hardware. Exchange required.

product.name: Alternator - 120A
product.description: New 120-amp alternator for reliable electrical system performance. Includes pulley and voltage regulator.
